short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show tweets in a tiled layout and watch them automatically update!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key Features:

1. Tiled Tweet Layout:
Experience your feed in a visually appealing tiled layout that organizes your feed neatly.

2. Efficient Navigation:
Easily browse tweets with intuitive navigation controls, making your journey more streamlined.

3. Real-Time Updates:
Stay in the loop with automatic feed refreshing, ensuring you never miss the latest tweets.

4. Multimedia Integration:
Enjoy an enhanced media viewing experience as images, videos, and GIFs are seamlessly integrated into the tiled layout.

Upgrade your Twitter / X experience with PostsDash today and transform the way you engage with your feed through a clean and organized tiled layout.

Simply navigate to twitter.com or x.com and click on the PostsDash link added to the sidebar to launch!
